TEXT.English: The Power of the American Dream:
Additional happiness from running Democracy, Constitution, Individualism and Free Enterprise
TEXT.French: Bonheur additionnel avec les doctrines démocratie, constitution, individualisme et libre entreprise
TEXT.German: Zusätzliche Zufriedenheit unter Demokratie, Verfassung, Individualismus und Freiem Unternehmertum
TEXT.Italian: Additional happiness from running Democracy, Constitution, Individualism and Free Enterprise
TEXT.Spanish: Additional happiness from running Democracy, Constitution, Individualism and Free Enterprise

TEXT.English: State religion spreads with temples to conquered cities
TEXT.French: La religion d'État se propage dans les villes conquises et un lieu de culte y est automatiquement construit
TEXT.German: Ausbreitung der Staatsreligion inklusive Tempeln in eroberten Städten
TEXT.Italian: La religione di stato si diffonde con templi e cattedrali nelle città conquistate
TEXT.Spanish: La religión oficial se propaga con los templos y catedrales a las ciudades conquistadas

TEXT.English: Mines on the mining resources provide doubled [ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_COMMERCE] increment.
Great Generals can start Golden Ages
TEXT.French: Les généraux illustres peuvent déclencher un âge d'or
TEXT.German: Große Generäle können Goldene Zeitalter auslösen
TEXT.Italian: Great Generals can start Golden Ages
TEXT.Spanish: Great Generals can start Golden Ages

TEXT.English: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to increase city happiness
TEXT.French: Les unités militaires peuvent asservir les unités vaincues, et il est possible de sacrifier des esclaves pour augmenter le bonheur des villes
TEXT.German: Versklavung besiegter feindlicher Einheiten durch Militäreinheiten, can Sklaven opfern, um Zufriedenheit in Städten zu erhöhen
TEXT.Italian: Le unità militari possono schiavizzare le unità nemiche sconfitte
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades militares pueden esclavizar a las unidades enemigas derrotadas

TEXT.English: The Power of the Cradle of Civilization:
TEXT.French: Le pouvoir du berceau de la civilisation :
TEXT.German: Die Macht der Wiege der Zivilisation:

TEXT.English: Receives a free technology for the first five technologies discovered
TEXT.French: Une technologie gratuite pour les cinq premières technologies découvertes
TEXT.German: Erhält eine weitere Technologie für die ersten fünf entdeckten Technologien
TEXT.Italian: Receives a free technology for the first five technologies discovered
TEXT.Spanish: Receives a free technology for the first five technologies discovered

TEXT.English: Additional infrastructure in new and acquired cities
Sugar counts as oil for Oil Industry
TEXT.French: Le sucre compte comme du pétrole pour l'Industrie pétrolière
TEXT.German: Zucker zählt als Öl für die Ölindustrie
TEXT.Italian: Sugar counts as oil for Oil Industry
TEXT.Spanish: Sugar counts as oil for Oil Industry

TEXT.English: Double gold value in trades, spies can bribe barbarian units
TEXT.French: L'or vaut en double lors des échanges, et les espions peuvent soudoyer les unités barbares
TEXT.German: Doppelter Wert von Gold beim Handeln, Spione können barbarische Einheiten bestechen
TEXT.Italian: Double gold value in trades, spies can bribe barbarian units
TEXT.Spanish: Double gold value in trades, spies can bribe barbarian units

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bribe Barbarians[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Allows your spy to offer gold to bribe one barbarian unit on this plot to join your army.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Soudoyer les barbares[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Permet à votre espion d'offrir de l'or afin de convaincre l'une des unités barbares sur cette case de se joindre à votre armée.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bribe Barbarians[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Allows your spy to offer gold to bribe one barbarian unit on this plot to join your army.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bribe Barbarians[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Allows your spy to offer gold to bribe one barbarian unit on this plot to join your army.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bribe Barbarians[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Allows your spy to offer gold to bribe one barbarian unit on this plot to join your army.

TEXT.English: Choose the barbarian unit you wish to bribe:
TEXT.German: Choose the barbarian unit you wish to bribe:
TEXT.Italian: Choose the barbarian unit you wish to bribe:
TEXT.Spanish: Choose the barbarian unit you wish to bribe:

TEXT.French: Les immigrants apportent des [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] dans vos villes

TEXT.English: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.
TEXT.French: En s'établissant à %s1, des immigrants ont accéléré de %d3 points l'apparition d'un %s2.
TEXT.German: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.
TEXT.Italian: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.
TEXT.Spanish: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.

TEXT.English: Can always hurry units with gold and pays half the cost and no extra upkeep for hurried units
TEXT.French: L'accélération des unités est toujours disponible et coûte deux fois moins cher ; pas de coût d'entretien supplémentaire pour ces unités
TEXT.German: Kann immer Einheiten mit Gold beschleunigen und bezahlt halbe Kosten und keinen zusätzlicher Unterhalt für beschleunigte Einheiten
TEXT.Italian: Dimezzati i costi di assunzione e mantenimento dei mercenari
TEXT.Spanish: Se reducen a la mitad los costes de contratación y mantenimiento de mercenarios

TEXT.English: Cities keep an additional 25% [ICON_FOOD] after growing
TEXT.French: Les villes conservent 25 % [ICON_FOOD] de plus après la croissance
TEXT.German: Städte behalten zusätzliche 25% [ICON_FOOD] nach dem Wachsen
TEXT.Italian: Velocità di addestramento 1,5X per le unità da mischia e con armi da fuoco
TEXT.Spanish: Velocidad de entrenamiento de unidades de cuerpo a cuerpo y con armas de pólvora multiplicada x1,5

TEXT.English: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America
TEXT.French: Pas de résistance à la conquête de villes en Amérique latine
TEXT.German: Keinen Widerstand in eroberten Städten in Lateinamerika
TEXT.Italian: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America
TEXT.Spanish: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America

TEXT.English: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.French: %s1 a levé une armée pour conquérir notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: %s1 hat eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.English: Monarchy, Redistribution and Deification are enabled at start
TEXT.French: La monarchie, la redistribution et la déification sont activées au départ
TEXT.German: Aktivierung von Monarchie, Umverteilung und Vergötterung beim Spielstart
TEXT.Italian: All'avvio sono abilitati governo ereditario e schiavitù
TEXT.Spanish: Gobierno hereditario y Esclavitud están activados al principio
El poder de la Royal Navy:

TEXT.English: Faraway Cities incur no extra Maintenance
TEXT.French: Les villes lointaines ne nécessitent pas d'entretien supplémentaire
TEXT.German: Weit entfernte Städte kosten keinen zusätzlichen Unterhalt
TEXT.Italian: Le unità navali hanno 2 possibilità di Attacchi improvvisi supplementari
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades navales tienen 2 posibilidades adicionales de ataque de iniciativa

TEXT.English: Cities have a trade connection to all other cities with your state religion
TEXT.French: Vos villes ont une connexion commerciale avec toutes les villes adeptes de votre religion d'État
TEXT.German: Städte haben eine Handelsverbindung zu allen anderen Städten mit Ihrer Staatsreligion
TEXT.Italian: Cities have a trade connection to all other cities with your state religion
TEXT.Spanish: Cities have a trade connection to all other cities with your state religion

TEXT.English: Diplomatic penalties expire faster, more likely to be voted for in congresses
TEXT.French: Les pénalités diplomatiques expirent plus vite, et les autres civilisations sont plus enclines à voter pour vous lors des congrès
TEXT.German: Diplomatische Mali verfallen schneller; höhere Wahrscheinlichkeit, Stimmen in Kongressen zu erhalten
TEXT.Italian: Le altre civiltà hanno un atteggiamento più amichevole
TEXT.Spanish: Las demás civilizaciones mantienen una actitud más amistosa

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la doctrine militaire :

TEXT.English: Units retain all their experience when upgraded
TEXT.French: Les unités conservent toute leur expérience lorsqu'elles sont améliorées
TEXT.German: Modernisierte Einheiten behalten ihre gesamte Erfahrung
TEXT.Italian: Units retain all their experience when upgraded
TEXT.Spanish: Units retain all their experience when upgraded

TEXT.English: +150% Great People birth rate until the end of the Classical Era
TEXT.French: Le taux de natalité des personnages illustres est augmenté de 150 % jusqu'à la fin de l'Ère classique
TEXT.German: +150% Geburtenrate von Großen Persönlichkeiten bis zum Ende des klassischen Zeitalters
TEXT.Italian: +150% tasso di natalità dei Grandi Personaggi fino alla fine del Medioevo
TEXT.Spanish: +100% a la tasa de natalidad de grandes personajes hasta el final de la Edad Media

TEXT.English: The Greeks have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.French: Les Grecs ont levé une armée pour conquérir notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: Die Griechen haben eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!
TEXT.Italian: The Greeks have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: The Greeks have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.English: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
TEXT.French: Les points de santé en excès contribuent à la croissance des villes pendant l'Ère antique
TEXT.German: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
TEXT.Italian: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
TEXT.Spanish: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
El poder de la Compañía de las Indias:

TEXT.English: Doubled yield and commerce from the trading company corporation
TEXT.French: Les rendements de la Compagnie commerciale sont doublés
TEXT.Italian: Tutte le unità marittime possono entrare in territorio nemico
TEXT.Spanish: Todas las unidades marítimas pueden entrar en territorio enemigo

TEXT.English: Double construction speed of state religion buildings
TEXT.French: La vistesse de construction des bâtiments liés à la religion d'État est doublée
TEXT.German: Doppelte Baugeschwindigkeit für Gebäude der Staatsreligion
TEXT.Italian: Double construction speed of state religion buildings
TEXT.Spanish: Double construction speed of state religion buildings

TEXT.English: Our population in %s1 is growing due to immigrants from the Old World!
TEXT.French: Notre population augmente grâce aux immigrants du Vieux Monde !
TEXT.German: Unsere Bevölkerung in %s1 wächst durch Einwanderer aus der Alten Welt!
TEXT.Italian: La nostra popolazione sta crescendo grazie agli immigranti dal vecchio mondo!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Nuestra población está creciendo como consecuencia de la inmigración procedente del Viejo Mundo!

TEXT.French: Les montagnes produisent 2 nourritures et 1 marteau
TEXT.Italian: Le montagne producono 2 cibo e 1 scudo
TEXT.Spanish: Las montañas producen 2 alimentos y 1 martillo

TEXT.English: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] for every three excess [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.French: Un [ICON_HEALTHY] pour chaque trois [ICON_HAPPY] en excès
TEXT.Spanish: No hay anarquía por las revoluciones

TEXT.English: Additional gold from the spread of the spice route.
TEXT.French: Additional gold from the spread of the spice route.
TEXT.German: Additional gold from the spread of the spice route.
TEXT.Italian: Additional gold from the spread of the spice route.
TEXT.Spanish: Additional gold from the spread of the spice route.

TEXT.English: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age
TEXT.French: Un spécialiste gratuit par ville jusqu'à l'Ère industrielle
TEXT.German: Zusätzlicher Spezialist in allen Städten bis zum Industriezeitalter
TEXT.Italian: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age
TEXT.Spanish: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age

TEXT.English: After discovering all medieval techs, every tech three other civilizations are willing to trade costs -50% [ICON_RESEARCH]
TEXT.French: Après avoir découvert toutes les technologies médiévales, chaque technologie coûte -50 % [ICON_RESEARCH] si trois civilisations sont disposées à l'échanger
TEXT.German: Nachdem alle Technologien des Mittelalters entdeckt wurden, kostet jede Technologie -50% [ICON_RESEARCH], die drei andere Zivilisationen zu tauschen bereit sind
TEXT.Italian: Tutte le unità militari terrestri hanno un bonus in difesa delle città
TEXT.Spanish: Todas las unidades militares terrestres tienen una bonificación al defender ciudades

TEXT.English: All land units can move through jungles and rainforests, can build farms on rainforest
TEXT.French: Toutes les unités terrestres peuvent se déplacer à travers la jungle, et les fermes peuvent être construites dans la forêt tropicale
TEXT.German: Landeinheiten können Dschungel und Regenwald durchqueren, kann Farmen in Regenwald errichten
TEXT.Italian: Tutte le unità di terra si possono muovere attraverso la giungla
TEXT.Spanish: Todas las unidades terrestres se pueden mover a través de las junglas

TEXT.English: Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness
TEXT.French: Les jungles, les forêts tropicales et les marécages rapportent de la nourriture et de la production, et ne causent pas de maladie
TEXT.German: Dschungel, Regenwälder und Marschen geben zusätzliche Nahrung und Produktion und verursachen keine Krankheit
TEXT.Italian: Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness
TEXT.Spanish: Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness

TEXT.French: Vous pouvez embaucher deux fois plus de spécialistes dans la capitale
TEXT.German: Doppelte Anzahl verfügbarer Spezialisten in der Hauptstadt

TEXT.French: +1 commerce sur toutes les cases terrestres
TEXT.Italian: +1 commercio in ogni casella di terra
TEXT.Spanish: +1 intercambio en cada casilla de tierra

TEXT.English: Improved resources adjacent to cities provide additional food and production
The Power of the Long Count:
TEXT.Italian: The Power of the Long Count:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of the Long Count:

TEXT.English: Cities receive additional food whenever a technology is discovered before the Middle Ages
TEXT.French: Les villes reçoivent de la nourriture lors de la découverte de technologies avant le Moyen Âge
TEXT.German: Städte erhalten zusätzliche Nahrung für jede Technologie, die vor dem Mittelalter entdeckt wird
TEXT.Italian: Cities receive additional food whenever a technology is discovered before the Middle Ages
TEXT.Spanish: Cities receive additional food whenever a technology is discovered before the Middle Ages

TEXT.French: Les fermes peuvent être construites sur les collines

TEXT.English: Cities threatened by your armies descend into unrest
TEXT.French: Les villes menacées par vos armées deviennent agitées
TEXT.German: Von Ihren Streitkräften bedrohte Städte verfallen in Unruhe
TEXT.Italian: Ogni città distrutta fa sì che le città nemiche vicine si arrendano, se avvicinate
TEXT.Spanish: Una ciudad arrasada provoca que las ciudades enemigas cercanas se rindan al aproximarse

TEXT.English: Your successful conquests have made your horde grow!
TEXT.French: Vos succès de conquête ont fait grandir votre horde !
TEXT.German: Eure erfolgreichen Eroberungen haben Eure Horde wachsen lassen!
TEXT.Italian: Your successful conquests have made your horde grow!
TEXT.Spanish: Your successful conquests have made your horde grow!

TEXT.English: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!
TEXT.French: Les habitants de %s1 tremblent de peur à l'approche de nos armées !
TEXT.German: Die Bürger von %s1 erzittern vor Furcht vor unseren anrückenden Truppen!
TEXT.Italian: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!
TEXT.Spanish: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!

TEXT.English: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!
TEXT.French: Effrayés par l'approche des armées mongoles, les habitants de %s1 ont abandonné leurs défenses !
TEXT.German: Aus Furcht vor den anrückenden mongolischen Armeen haben die Bürger von %s1 ihre Stellungen aufgegeben!
TEXT.Italian: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!
TEXT.Spanish: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!

TEXT.English: fear the same fate of their neighbour inhabitants and surrender!
TEXT.French: craignent de subir le même sort que leurs voisins et se rendent !
TEXT.German: fürchten, dass sie dasselbe Schicksal ereilt wie ihre Nachbarn, und kapitulieren!
TEXT.Italian: temono di subire lo stesso fato dei vicini e si arrendono!
TEXT.Spanish: temen sufrir el mismo destino que sus vecinos y se rinden.

TEXT.English: Improvements that yield food give one extra food on plains tiles until the Renaissance
TEXT.French: Sur les cases de plaines, les améliorations qui rapportent de la nourriture en rapportent une de plus jusqu'à la Renaissance
TEXT.German: Verbesserungen, die Nahrung produzieren, geben eine zusätzliche Nahrungseinheit auf Ebenenfeldern bis zur Renaissance
TEXT.Italian: Improvements that yield food give one extra food on plains tiles until the Renaissance
TEXT.Spanish: Improvements that yield food give one extra food on plains tiles until the Renaissance

TEXT.English: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed
TEXT.French: Au moment de compléter un bâtiment, les villes reçoivent en culture la moitié du coût de construction
TEXT.German: Städte erhalten die Hälfte der Baukosten als Kultur, wenn ein Gebäude errichtet wird
TEXT.Italian: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed
TEXT.Spanish: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed

TEXT.English: The Power of the Shield of the Warrior King:
TEXT.French: NThe Power of the Shield of the Warrior King:
TEXT.German: The Power of the Shield of the Warrior King:
TEXT.Italian: The Power of the Shield of the Warrior King:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of the Shield of the Warrior King:

TEXT.English: Fortified units can get up to 50% defense bonus
TEXT.French: Fortified units can get up to 50% defense bonus
TEXT.German: Fortified units can get up to 50% defense bonus
TEXT.Italian: Fortified units can get up to 50% defense bonus
TEXT.Spanish: Fortified units can get up to 50% defense bonus

TEXT.English: Additional stability for recently conquered cities
TEXT.French: Stabilité additionnelle pour les villes récemment conquises
TEXT.German: Zusätzliche Stabilität für kürzlich eroberte Städte
TEXT.Italian: Additional stability for recently conquered cities
TEXT.Spanish: Additional stability for recently conquered cities

TEXT.English: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.French: Pas de pénalité pour l'expansion culturelle sur les cases d'océan
TEXT.German: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.Italian: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.Spanish: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles

TEXT.English: Naval units can establish embassies. Embassies provide 2 [ICON_GOLD] in your capital
[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Establish Embassy[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Provides 2[ICON_GOLD] in your capital. Cannot lose contact with this civ.

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la Liberté dorée :

TEXT.English: Additional food and commerce during Golden Ages
TEXT.French: Les âges d'or rapportent davantage de nourriture et de commerce
TEXT.German: Zusätzliche Nahrung und Kommerz durch Goldene Zeitalter
TEXT.Italian: Additional food and commerce during Golden Ages
TEXT.Spanish: Additional food and commerce during Golden Ages

TEXT.English: Ocean Trade allowed with Cartography, reduced instability for overseas colonies
TEXT.French: Le commerce transocéanique est permis avec la Cartographie, et l'instabilité causée par les colonies d'outre-mer est réduite
TEXT.German: Ozeanhandel ermöglicht durch Kartographie, verringerte Instabilität durch Übersee-Kolonien
TEXT.Italian: Ocean Trade allowed with Cartography, reduced instability for overseas colonies
TEXT.Spanish: Ocean Trade allowed with Cartography, reduced instability for overseas colonies

TEXT.English: Buildings that already exist in your capital receive +30% construction speed.
TEXT.French: Les bâtiments déjà présents dans votre capitale sont construits 30 % plus vite
TEXT.German: Gebäude, die bereits in der Hauptstadt errichtet wurden, erhalten +30% Baugeschwindigkeit.
TEXT.Italian: Le strade all'interno dei confini romani permettono movimento delle unità 4X invece di 2X
TEXT.Spanish: Las carreteras dentro de las fronteras romanas permiten un movimiento de unidades multiplicado x4 en lugar de x2

TEXT.English: An army has been fielded to attack %s1_civ_adjective!
TEXT.French: Une armée a été levée pour attaquer %s1_civ_adjective !
TEXT.German: Eine Armee wurde zusammengestellt zum Angriff auf %s1_civ_adjective!
TEXT.Italian: An army has been fielded to attack %s1_civ_adjective!
TEXT.Spanish: An army has been fielded to attack %s1_civ_adjective!

TEXT.English: The Romans have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.French: Les Romains ont levé une armée pour conquérir notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: Die Römer haben eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!
TEXT.Italian: The Romans have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: The Romans have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.English: Your triumphant victories have enabled you to field another legion!
TEXT.French: Vos victoires triomphantes vous ont permis de lever une autre légion !
TEXT.German: Eure triumphalen Siege haben Euch ermöglicht, eine weitere Legion auszuheben!
TEXT.Italian: Your triumphant victories have enabled you to field another legion!
TEXT.Spanish: Your triumphant victories have enabled you to field another legion!

TEXT.English: Enemy units in Russia take damage every turn
TEXT.French: Les unités ennemies en Russie subissent des dommages à chaque tour
TEXT.German: Schaden in jeder Runde für feindliche Einheiten in Russland
TEXT.Italian: Le unità nemiche in Russia subiscono danni a ogni turno
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades enemigas en Rusia sufren daños cada turno

TEXT.French: Les unités navales reçoivent +2 points de mouvement
TEXT.Italian: Le unità navali ricevono +2 punti di movimento
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades navales nuevas reciben +2 puntos de movimiento

TEXT.English: Settled Great People create two extra [ICON_HAPPY] and one extra [ICON_GOLD]
Foreign trade route yields increased by 100%
Extra commerce on coast and ocean tiles
TEXT.French: Les cases d'océan rapportent du commerce supplémentaire
TEXT.German: Zusätzlicher Kommerz auf Küsten- und Ozeanfeldern
TEXT.Italian: Extra commerce on coast and ocean tiles
TEXT.Spanish: Extra commerce on coast and ocean tiles

TEXT.English: The Tamils have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.French: Les Tamouls ont levé une armée pour conquérir notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: Die Tamilen haben eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!
TEXT.Italian: The Tamils have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: The Tamils have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.English: Melee units do not require strategic resources
TEXT.French: Les unités de combat rapproché ne requièrent pas de ressources stratégiques
TEXT.German: Melee units do not require strategic resources
TEXT.Italian: Melee units do not require strategic resources
TEXT.Spanish: Melee units do not require strategic resources

TEXT.English: The Power of Father Governs Children:
TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la figure paternelle :
TEXT.German: Die Macht von Vater Regiert Kinder:
TEXT.Italian: The Power of Father Governs Children:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Father Governs Children:

TEXT.English: Can train unlimited missionaries; Missionaries can enter foreign territory
TEXT.French: Pas de limite de missionnaires ; les missionnaires peuvent entrer en territoire étranger
TEXT.German: Kann unbegrenzt Missionare ausbilden; Missionare können fremdes Territorium betreten
TEXT.Italian: Can train unlimited missionaries; Missionaries can enter foreign territory
TEXT.Spanish: Can train unlimited missionaries; Missionaries can enter foreign territory

TEXT.English: Barbarians cannot enter your territory during peacetime and mounted barbarians will join your armies if attacked during wartime
TEXT.French: En temps de paix, les barbares ne peuvent pas entrer dans votre territoire ; en temps de guerre, les barbares montés se joignent à votre armée si vous les attaquez
TEXT.German: Barbaren können Ihr Territorium in Friedenszeiten nicht betreten und berittene Barbaren, die in Kriegszeiten angegriffen werden, treten Ihren Armeen bei
TEXT.Italian: Barbarians cannot enter your territory during peacetime and mounted barbarians will join your armies if attacked during wartime
TEXT.Spanish: Barbarians cannot enter your territory during peacetime and mounted barbarians will join your armies if attacked during wartime

TEXT.English: Can Conscript two extra Units in Cities with Non-State Religions
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez enrôler deux unités supplémentaires dans les villes adeptes de religions non officielles
TEXT.German: Kann zwei zusätzliche Einheiten in Städten mit Nicht-Staatsreligionen rekrutieren
TEXT.Italian: La maggioranza di cultura straniera nelle città turche è convertita in cultura turca
TEXT.Spanish: La mayor parte de la cultura extranjera en ciudades turcas se convierte a cultura turca

TEXT.English: Units in cities, wooded plots and on hills have 2 first extra strikes
Additional gold from pillaging, sacking cities and sinking ships during the Middle Ages
TEXT.French: Piller, saccager des villes et couler des navires vous rapporte de l'or supplémentaire pendant le Moyen Âge
TEXT.German: Zusätzliches gold durch Plünderung von Städten und Verbesserungen und das Versenken von Schiffen während des Mittelalters
TEXT.Spanish: Se obtiene oro x5 del pillaje

TEXT.English: Extra production and commerce on city tiles
TEXT.French: Extra production and commerce on city tiles
TEXT.German: Extra production and commerce on city tiles
TEXT.Italian: Extra production and commerce on city tiles
TEXT.Spanish: Extra production and commerce on city tiles

TEXT.English: Extra food, production and commerce in your capital from Jewish cities with open borders; immigration from Jewish cities at war
TEXT.French: La capitale reçoit de la nourriture, de la production et du commerce pour chaque ville juive avec un accord de libre passage, et des immigrants des villes juives en guerre
TEXT.German: Extra food, production and commerce in your capital from Jewish cities with open borders; immigration from Jewish cities at war
TEXT.Italian: Extra food, production and commerce in your capital from Jewish cities with open borders; immigration from Jewish cities at war
TEXT.Spanish: Extra food, production and commerce in your capital from Jewish cities with open borders; immigration from Jewish cities at war

TEXT.English: The Jewish population of %s1 is fleeing to Israel!
TEXT.French: La population juive de %s1 émigre vers Israël!
TEXT.German: The Jewish population of %s1 is fleeing to Israel!
TEXT.Italian: The Jewish population of %s1 is fleeing to Israel!
TEXT.Spanish: The Jewish population of %s1 is fleeing to Israel!

TEXT.English: The Jewish population of %s1 is fleeing %s2 and performing their Aliyah to %s3!
TEXT.French: La population juive de %s1 a quitté %s2 afin d'accomplir son alya %s3!
TEXT.German: The Jewish population of %s1 is fleeing %s2 and performing their Aliyah to %s3!
TEXT.Italian: The Jewish population of %s1 is fleeing %s2 and performing their Aliyah to %s3!
TEXT.Spanish: The Jewish population of %s1 is fleeing %s2 and performing their Aliyah to %s3!

TEXT.English: The Jewish population of %s1 is emigrating to the Jewish Kingdom!
TEXT.French: The Jewish population of %s1 is emigrating to the Jewish Kingdom!
TEXT.German: The Jewish population of %s1 is emigrating to the Jewish Kingdom!
TEXT.Italian: The Jewish population of %s1 is emigrating to the Jewish Kingdom!
TEXT.Spanish: The Jewish population of %s1 is emigrating to the Jewish Kingdom!

TEXT.English: Our population in %s1 is growing due to Jewish immigrants from less tolerant nations!
TEXT.French: Our population in %s1 is growing due to Jewish immigrants from less tolerant nations
TEXT.German: Our population in %s1 is growing due to Jewish immigrants from less tolerant nations
TEXT.Italian: Our population in %s1 is growing due to Jewish immigrants from less tolerant nations
TEXT.Spanish: Our population in %s1 is growing due to Jewish immigrants from less tolerant nations

TEXT.English: Extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], and can build farms on desert
TEXT.French: Extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], and can build farms on desert
TEXT.German: Extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], and can build farms on desert
TEXT.Italian: Extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], and can build farms on desert
TEXT.Spanish: Extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], and can build farms on desert

TEXT.English: 25% of [ICON_COMMERCE] from trade routes is converted to [ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.French: 25% of [ICON_COMMERCE] from trade routes is converted to [ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.German: 25% of [ICON_COMMERCE] from trade routes is converted to [ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.Italian: 25% of [ICON_COMMERCE] from trade routes is converted to [ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.Spanish: 25% of [ICON_COMMERCE] from trade routes is converted to [ICON_FOOD]

TEXT.English: Tolerance is enabled at the start. Immigration from Jewish cities. Victories against Barbarians contribute to Great General births.
TEXT.French: Tolerance is enabled at the start. Immigration from Jewish cities. Victories against Barbarians contribute to Great General births.
TEXT.German: Tolerance is enabled at the start. Immigration from Jewish cities. Victories against Barbarians contribute to Great General births.
TEXT.Italian: Tolerance is enabled at the start. Immigration from Jewish cities. Victories against Barbarians contribute to Great General births.
TEXT.Spanish: Tolerance is enabled at the start. Immigration from Jewish cities. Victories against Barbarians contribute to Great General births.

TEXT.English: +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] of ancient era buildings in cities with Stone
TEXT.French: +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] of ancient era buildings in cities with Stone
TEXT.German: +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] of ancient era buildings in cities with Stone
TEXT.Italian: +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] of ancient era buildings in cities with Stone
TEXT.Spanish: +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] of ancient era buildings in cities with Stone

TEXT.English: Core Cities also yield a Farm's base yields.
TEXT.French: Core Cities also yield a Farm's base yields.
TEXT.German: Core Cities also yield a Farm's base yields.
TEXT.Italian: Core Cities also yield a Farm's base yields.
TEXT.Spanish: Core Cities also yield a Farm's base yields.

TEXT.English: Cities start with extra Culture. Extra Food from unimproved Forests.
TEXT.French: Cities start with extra Culture. Extra Food from unimproved Forests.
TEXT.German: Cities start with extra Culture. Extra Food from unimproved Forests.
TEXT.Italian: Cities start with extra Culture. Extra Food from unimproved Forests.
TEXT.Spanish: Cities start with extra Culture. Extra Food from unimproved Forests.

TEXT.English: Doubled [ICON_RESEARCH] prior to the discovery of Pottery.
TEXT.French: Doubled [ICON_RESEARCH] prior to the discovery of Pottery.
TEXT.German: Doubled [ICON_RESEARCH] prior to the discovery of Pottery.
TEXT.Italian: Doubled [ICON_RESEARCH] prior to the discovery of Pottery.
TEXT.Spanish: Doubled [ICON_RESEARCH] prior to the discovery of Pottery.

TEXT.English: Extra Production in the Capital. +1 Priest Slot from Pagan Temples.
TEXT.French: Extra Production in the Capital. +1 Priest Slot from Pagan Temples.
TEXT.German: Extra Production in the Capital. +1 Priest Slot from Pagan Temples.
TEXT.Italian: Extra Production in the Capital. +1 Priest Slot from Pagan Temples.
TEXT.Spanish: Extra Production in the Capital. +1 Priest Slot from Pagan Temples.

TEXT.English: +1 Food on tiles adjacent to Mountains.
TEXT.French: +1 Food on tiles adjacent to Mountains.
TEXT.German: +1 Food on tiles adjacent to Mountains.
TEXT.Italian: +1 Food on tiles adjacent to Mountains.
TEXT.Spanish: +1 Food on tiles adjacent to Mountains.

TEXT.English: The Power of the Mochica Heritage:
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de las mochica heritage:

TEXT.English: Recieves a Free Artist in the capital for every other improved resource in Northwestern South American.
TEXT.French: Recieves a Free Artist in the capital for every other improved resource in Northwestern South American.
TEXT.German: Recieves a Free Artist in the capital for every other improved resource in Northwestern South American.
TEXT.Italian: Recieves a Free Artist in the capital for every other improved resource in Northwestern South American.
TEXT.Spanish: Recieves a Free Artist in the capital for every other improved resource in Northwestern South American.

TEXT.English: Trade routes do not require roads. Extra Commerce on coastal city tiles.
TEXT.French: Trade routes do not require roads. Extra Commerce on coastal city tiles.
TEXT.German: Trade routes do not require roads. Extra Commerce on coastal city tiles.
TEXT.Italian: Trade routes do not require roads. Extra Commerce on coastal city tiles.
TEXT.Spanish: Trade routes do not require roads. Extra Commerce on coastal city tiles.

TEXT.French: La nourriture en excès fournit du commerce additionnel.
